name: Best Ever Cilantro Corn Salsa
author: Lisa Avery Croff
summary: This is a recipe I have been making for years. It is the number one dish people ask me to bring to parties. It is great with tortilla chips or on top of grilled chicken or steak. It also makes a wonderful filling for vegetarian tacos.
ingredients: 2 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed
½ bunch cilantro, stems cut off and leaves chopped
directions: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Cook corn on the preheated grill until the kernels are lightly charred but still firm, 3 to 5 minutes per side, turning often
Cut kernels off the cobs, transfer to a large salad bowl, and let cool
Mix in tomatoes, avocados, cilantro, white onion, garlic, olive oil, and red wine vinegar; season with kosher salt
